title: How the Darién Gap Is Reshaping Migrant Journeys
description: The pandemic, climate change and growing conflict are forcing a seismic shift in global migration. In few places is that more clear than a perilous crossing called the Darién Gap.
dc:creator: Julie Turkewitz and Federico Rios
media:credit: Federico Rios for The New York Times
media:description: Sarah Cuauro while traveling through the Darién, one of the world’s most dangerous migrant corridors, in an attempt to reach the United States.
